original_text: Then the Lord's bright glory rose up. It went up from above the cherubs. It moved to the entrance of the temple. The cloud filled the temple. The bright glory of the Lord's shone everywhere in the yard.
korean_text: 여호와의 영광이 그룹에서 올라와 성전 문지방에 이르니 구름이 성전에 가득하며 여호와의 영화로운 광채가 뜰에 가득하였고

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord's bright glory rose up
It went up from above the cherubs
It moved to the entrance of the temple
The bright glory of the Lord's shone everywhere in the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 밝은 영광이 뜰 모든 곳에서 빛났다
